content.rendered: World Aids Day was celebrated at Sr. Secondary school Kallar Patta in Bilaspur district of Himachal Pradesh. An awareness session and rally on HIV/AIDS was organized and saw the active participation of the students and the teachers of the school. 111 people participated of which 90 were students of the school.
